parameters.name: Suppression
parameters.description: Suppression state of the selected component as defined in swComponentSuppressionState_e

parameters.name: Solving
parameters.description: Solving state of the selected component as defined in swComponentSolvingOption_e

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.description: True if you want to show the selected component in the graphics area, false if not

parameters.name: RefConfigName
parameters.description: If a non-empty string is specified, then the referenced configuration of the selected component is changed to this named configuration If an empty string is specified, then the default referenced configuration is used

parameters.name: ExcludeFromBOM
parameters.description: True to exclude the configuration from the BOM, false to not

parameters.name: IsEnvelope
parameters.description: True if the selected component is an envelope, false if not

parameters.name: SaveAssemblyAsPartOption
parameters.description: Option for the selected component when saving this assembly as a part as defined in swASMSLDPRTCompPref_e

title: IAssemblyDoc.CompConfigProperties6
description: Sets the properties for the selected component in the specified configuration.
signature:
System.Boolean CompConfigProperties6( 
   System.Int32
Suppression
,
   System.Int32
Solving
,
   System.Boolean
Visibility
,
   System.Boolean
UseNamedRefConfig
,
   System.String
RefConfigName
,
   System.Boolean
ExcludeFromBOM
,
   System.Boolean
IsEnvelope
,
   System.Int32
SaveAssemblyAsPartOption
)

parameters.name: Suppression
parameters.description: Suppression state of the selected component as defined in swComponentSuppressionState_e

parameters.name: Solving
parameters.description: Solving state of the selected component as defined in swComponentSolvingOption_e

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.description: True if you want to show the selected component in the graphics area, false if not

parameters.name: RefConfigName
parameters.description: If a non-empty string is specified, then the referenced configuration of the selected component is changed to this named configuration If an empty string is specified, then the default referenced configuration is used

parameters.name: ExcludeFromBOM
parameters.description: True to exclude the configuration from the BOM, false to not

parameters.name: IsEnvelope
parameters.description: True if the selected component is an envelope, false if not

parameters.name: SaveAssemblyAsPartOption
parameters.description: Option for the selected component when saving this assembly as a part as defined in swASMSLDPRTCompPref_e

returns: True if setting the properties of the selected component in the specified configuration is successful, false if not
remarks:
You can use configurations to save certain display characteristics with each of the assembly components and retrieve that configuration in the future. SOLIDWORKS Design applies the settings that you specify with this method to the active configuration.
You cannot set the selected component to lightweight using this method.
Known reasons for failure of this method include:
Invalid suppression state specified in Suppression.
Not pre-selecting the component.
